bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Fayum Pantheons as Documented by 2nd Century Painted Wooden Panels.
bibl.note: The remarkable case of Soknebtynis and Min at Tebtynis. - The cult of Pramarres and the unique iconography of Moscow Pushkine Mus. inv. I, 1a 6860. - Harpocrates, his so-called ""popularity"" and his syncretism with Dionysos. - Isis vs Hathor. - Nemesis, the Dioscuri, Kore-Demeter and the Agathodemons. - Heron, his entourage and the pantheon of gods in arms.

bibl.title: Von der Pharaonenzeit bis zur Spätantike. Kulturelle Vielfalt im Fayum. Akten der 5. Internationalen Fayum-Konferenz, 29. Mai bis 1. Juni 2013, Leipzig.

bibl.seg: Vincent Rondot, Graeco-Roman Fayum Pantheons as Documented by 2nd Century Painted Wooden Panels.

Nadine Quenouille (ed.), Von der Pharaonenzeit bis zur Spätantike. Kulturelle Vielfalt im Fayum. Akten der 5. Internationalen Fayum-Konferenz, 29. Mai bis 1. Juni 2013, Leipzig (Wiesbaden, 2015) pp. 145-162, 5 pll.

The remarkable case of Soknebtynis and Min at Tebtynis. - The cult of Pramarres and the unique iconography of Moscow Pushkine Mus. inv. I, 1a 6860. - Harpocrates, his so-called ""popularity"" and his syncretism with Dionysos. - Isis vs Hathor. - Nemesis, the Dioscuri, Kore-Demeter and the Agathodemons. - Heron, his entourage and the pantheon of gods in arms.
